name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek argues with his father H.G. Tannhaus because he doesn't pay him enough attention.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: H.G. Tannhaus argues with his son Marek about attention and family matters.

name: Sonja Tannhaus
description: Sonja is not part of the argument.

name: Charlotte Tannhaus
description: Charlotte is not part of the argument.

name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and little Charlotte die in a car accident.

name: Sonja Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and little Charlotte die in a car accident.

name: Charlotte Tannhaus
description: Marek, Sonja and little Charlotte die in a car accident.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: H.G. is not part of the accident.

name: Marek Tannhaus
description: Marek and Charlotte reunite after the accident.

name: Charlotte Tannhaus
description: Marek and Charlotte reunite after the accident.

name: Sonja Tannhaus
description: Sonja is not part of the reunion.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Adult H.G. Tannhaus remembers his family.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: He wants to create a time machine to undo it all.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: He spends the next years building a time machine in the bunker.

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Old H.G. Tannhaus finishes his machine...

name: H.G. Tannhaus
description: Instead of saving his family, he splits and destroys his world, thus creating both Adam and Eve worlds.
